Description: On I-64 in the City of Norfolk, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel West, motorists can expect potential delays due to a bridge/tunnel stoppage. All west lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Bridge/Tunnel Stoppage

Description: On Rt. 688 in the County of Mecklenburg, in the vicinity of Wilkerson Rd; Rt. 677E/W (Mecklenburg County), motorists can expect delays due to standing water. All north lanes are closed. All south lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Standing Water - Closed

Description: On VA-91 North in the County of Washington, in the vicinity of Croweville Dr; Rt. 1320N/S (Washington County), motorists can expect delays due to a disabled tractor trailer.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Tractor Trailer
